project_abstract.cdata: The specific objectives of the Health Sector Management Project for Macedonia are: (i) to upgrade Ministry of Health (MOH) and Health Insurance Fund (HIF) capacity to formulate and effectively implement health policies, health insurance, financial management, and contracting of providers; and (ii) to develop and implement an efficient scheme of restructuring of hospital services with emphasis on developing day-care services and shifting to primary care. The extension is necessary to complete procurement of information technology (IT) equipment.  Bidding procedures are completed and contracts for IT equipment will be signed as soon as the extension of closing date is granted.  The activities that will be completed during the extension include delivery, acceptance and quality control of equipment.
